casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY DOCKET

91-2003. Northwest Ohio Bar Assn. v. Noble.

Motion on behalf of John Sausser Steel Company for waiver of disqualification of John D. Noble in Hancock C.P. case No. 85-5225-MJ. Motion denied.

Holmes and H. Brown, JJ., would defer ruling on this motion pending a response from relator bar association.
